name: data_analysis
description: Analyze historical or operational data to extract trends, insights, and key findings for business proposals

inputs.label: Analysis Title
inputs.description: A descriptive title for this analysis

inputs.label: Dataset Description
inputs.description: What data are you analyzing? (e.g., 'MCS device volumes over 22 months', 'Patient encounter volumes by service line')

inputs.label: Time Period
inputs.description: Date range covered by the data (e.g., 'Jan 2024 - Oct 2025')

inputs.label: Business Context
inputs.description: Why is this data important? What decision or proposal does it support?

inputs.label: Key Question
inputs.description: What specific question are you trying to answer with this data?

inputs.label: Metrics of Interest
inputs.description: Which specific metrics should the analysis focus on? (comma-separated or list)

inputs.label: Target Audience
inputs.description: Who will read this analysis? (e.g., 'Hospital executives', 'Department leadership', 'Board members')

inputs.label: Desired Emphasis
inputs.description: What message or trend do you want to highlight? (e.g., 'Volume growth justifies staffing increase')

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.description: 1-2 paragraph overview with key metrics and conclusion

sections.title: Trends & Metrics
sections.description: Key trends with tables showing baseline, current, and % change. Use 2-3 tables max.

sections.title: Conclusions
sections.description: Business implications and recommended actions based on findings (2-3 short paragraphs max)

verification_questions.question: Are trend calculations accurate and clearly explained?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: Double-check all growth percentages and calculations. Show your math.

verification_questions.question: Does the analysis directly address the key question?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: Ensure the analysis explicitly answers the question posed in the inputs.

verification_questions.question: Are the findings presented in a clear, digestible format?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: Use bullet points, tables, and clear headings to improve readability.

verification_questions.question: Is the business context clearly connected to the data insights?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: Explicitly link data trends to the business decision or proposal.

verification_questions.question: Are visualizations or tables used effectively to communicate insights?
verification_questions.remediation_hint: Consider adding markdown tables or ASCII charts to visualize key trends.

criteria.name: Conciseness
criteria.description: Analysis is 2-3 pages max with no redundancy

excellent.description: Tight 2-3 page format, no wasted words

criteria.name: Data Accuracy
criteria.description: All calculations and trends are mathematically correct

criteria.name: Clarity & Presentation
criteria.description: Insights are clearly communicated using tables and bullets, not prose

good.description: Mostly clear with minor improvements needed

criteria.name: Business Relevance
criteria.description: Analysis directly supports the business decision with clear 'so what' statements

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: All key metrics analyzed without redundancy
